Identifier:FixedStr, 1 byte(?)
Share_info:share_info_type
share_data¶
share_info¶
share_info_type = None¶
Share_data:
Previuos_block:int 32 bytes
Coinbase:VarStrType, maximum number of Str characters is equal to the maximum value of unsigned long long.
Nonce:4 bytes

if Share.Version >= 34:

address:VarStrType

else

pubkey_hash:int 20 bytes
Subsidy:int 8 bytes
Donation:int 2 bytes
Stale_info:orphan/doa/None | Enum 1 byte
Desired_version:
 unsigned (long long/int)

if [Segwit active in this version share [check is_segwit_activated]]

segwit_data:

segwit_data

txid_merkle_link

branch: list int 32 bytes * the number of objects in the list

index: always 0

wtxid_merkle_root: int 32 bytes

txid_merkle_link:

branch: list int 32 bytes * the number of objects in the list

index: 0

wtxid_merkle_root: int 32 bytes

if Share.Version < 34:

new_transaction_hashes:
 list int 32 bytes * the number of objects in the list
transaction_hash_refs:
 list unsigned long long/unsigned int * the number of objects in the list
Far_share_hash:int 32 bytes
Max_bits:4 bytes
Bits:4 bytes
Timestamp:4 bytes
Absheight:4 bytes
Abswork:16 bytes

class data.ShareStore(prefix, net, share_cb, verified_hash_cb)¶

Store shares in files and retrieve it.

add_share(share)¶
add_verified_hash(share_hash)¶
check_archive_dirname()¶

Checking for the existence of an archive folder, if it does not exist, creates it.

check_remove()¶

File check. If share_hashes and verified_hashes are empty, then the file is archived.

forget_share(share_hash)¶
forget_verified_share(share_hash)¶
get_filenames_and_next()¶

The method returns a list of available files and the name of the next if available will be filled.
